page.title: 12My Family in Cold Ashby
page.content: I live with my mum,who is divorced,my dad lives in Newcastle.My family live in Cold Ashby,that is my mum,Ivan-my brother and myself.I have brothers and sisters in Newcastle,They are Karen, Antony and Cathrine who is 2 years old. Ivan and I see my dad about twice a year,which isn't very nice,sometimes he phones up. My dad spends a lot on Ivan and I,last Christmas he bought Ivan a BMX bike, a tool kit and things for starting at the Comprehensive School; and I got a bike as well as a type- writer. We go to fun parks,but that isn't often either.My dad works in a taxi firm that he owns,which is why he doesn't see us very often.My mum works as a cleaner and we have just enough money to live on.
